__e: You know, you're always leaving town, you're always struggling with yourself!
When I say go, you run.
I'm nice to you, you're a jerk.
Where the hell are you going?
- The moment he calls, you run to his side.
My dear, why do you keep coming and going?
When I say go, I want you to run as fast as you can - into that church.
One minute we're clicking, and the next you're running for your life.
When I tell you to, run as fast as you can through the forest.
You're running away because the kiss meant something.
This man gave you a solution and you ran.
Now it's your turn, and all you can do is run away.
